About Me

Passionate about building technology that makes a difference

With over a decade of experience in the startup ecosystem, I've dedicated my career to building innovative solutions that bridge the gap between complex technology and everyday users. My journey has taken me from founding multiple startups to becoming a recognized voice in the AI and data science community.

I believe in the power of open source and have contributed to numerous projects that help developers and data scientists work more efficiently. My current focus is on making data analysis more accessible through conversational AI, democratizing insights for everyone.

PandasAI

Active Development

A Python library that integrates generative AI capabilities into pandas, enabling conversational data analysis. Transform natural language questions into data insights without writing complex code.

Experience & Impact

A decade of building, learning, and innovating

Creator of PandasAI

2023 - Present

Launched PandasAI, revolutionizing how data scientists interact with data through natural language. Achieved 50K+ GitHub stars and millions of downloads.

2020 - Present

Building AI-powered data solutions for enterprises. Leading a team focused on making data more accessible through conversational interfaces.
